title: The Trip
brief_description: It’s Halloween and Louie is sad because his family has moved to a new neighbourhood and he doesn’t know anyone there. Left to play alone, Louise paints a scene in a shoebox and imagines himself back in his old street with his old friends, having wonderful adventures. Based on the book by Ezra Jack Keats and narrated by Charles Turner.
